schema.title: GnuPGPublicKey is a representation of a GnuPG public key

owner.title: Owner holds the owner identification, e.g. a name and e-mail address

trust.title: Trust holds the level of trust assigned to this key

keyData.title: KeyData holds the raw key data, in base64 encoded format

fingerprint.title: Fingerprint is the fingerprint of the key

keyID.title: KeyID specifies the key ID, in hexadecimal string format

subType.title: SubType holds the key's sub type (e.g. rsa4096)
